mapper.sql: ID, APP_ID, FSSJ, JSR, LX, NR
mapper.insert: insert into l_msg (ID, APP_ID, FSSJ, JSR, LX, NR) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nr,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update l_msg
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FSSJ = #{fssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JSR = #{jsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LX = #{lx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NR = #{nr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update l_msg set APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FSSJ = #{fssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JSR = #{jsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LX = #{lx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NR = #{nr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select * from l_msg where jsr REGEXP #{jsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and APP_ID=#{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and LX=#{lx,jdbcType=INTEGER}
